version_description:
A critical bug with percentage operator is fixed
Other bug fixes
Bug fixes

- Added Split-Screen Multitasking Support of all Themes
- Added Bluetooth Keyboard Support
- Added Copy/Paste in the Result
Bug fixes

- Over 170 new units;
- 2 new categories - density and viscosity;
- New default skin;
- Bug fixes;

- iPhone Version Added
- Apple Watch Version Added
- All skins can be unlocked for FREE
- New icon
Bug fixes
- speed improvement & bug fixing

- You can now define how many digits you want after the decimal sign;
- New units in the converter asked from our users;
- 3D Touch menu for fast access to your preferred app page;
- Tooltips for the main UI elements;
- Bugfixes.
Fixes a bug where some people have black screen after update.
Bug fixes

1. Added more currencies, including:
Bitcoin, Belarusian Ruble, Chilean Unit of Account (UF), Cuban Convertible Peso, Estonian Kroon, Eritrean Nakfa, Guernsey Pound, Manx pound, Jersey Pound, Cayman Islands Dollar, Maltese Lira, Mozambican Metical, Silver (troy ounce), Gold (troy ounce), Palladium Ounce, Platinum Ounce, Zambian Kwacha (pre-2013), Zambian Kwacha, Zimbabwean dollar, South Sudanese Pound, Chinese Yuan ‘Offshore’
2. Bug fixes
Bugfixes

Thank you for downloading CalConvert. If you like this app, please leave us a review!
For questions and feedback, please email contact@maplemedia.io

-Bug fixes and performance improvements
-Update to design to improve your experience
-New favoriting system

- bug fixes and performance improvements
- design improvements

- bug fixes and performance improvements
- design improvements including new search functionality

A new update for CalConvert is here! This release includes:
- Bug fix for iPhone X users, applying themes no longer results in a crash
- Other small but significant bug fixes and app optimizations

Thank you for downloading CalConvert: Currency Converter! If you like this app, please leave us a review!
For questions and feedback, please email contact@maplemedia.io

A new update for CalConvert is here, this release includes:

- Small but significant app optimizations and improvements for iOS 13
- CalConvert uses Dark Mode by default, with other themes available in settings - check them out!

Thanks for using CalConvert! If you like our app, please leave us a review.

Questions, feedback or issues? Email contact@maplemedia.io for fast and friendly support from our team!

A new update for CalConvert is here, this release includes:

- Small but significant app optimizations and improvements for iOS 13
- CalConvert themes, including dark and light mode options, are available in settings - check them out!
- This update includes a fix to the subtraction function, which was disabled in the previous release

Thanks for using CalConvert! If you like our app, please leave us a review.

Questions, feedback or issues? Email contact@maplemedia.io for fast and friendly support from our team!

Thanks for updating to the latest version of CalConvert! Here’s what’s new:

- Introducing CalConvert PRO: one-time purchase to unlock all 18 themes, access Premium Support and more!
- Added manual refresh action so you can pull down to refresh currencies if they are not auto-updating.
- Squashed a bug on Settings menu where some users reported issues.
- Enhanced text color on Themes screen to be more user friendly.
- Overall performance updates & stability improvements.

Feedback? Issues? Contact us at contact@maplemedia.io for fast and friendly support.

We are excited to announce the release of new iOS 14 Home Screen Widgets & other updates to CalConvert:

◊ Shortcut Widget - A free, medium-sized widget to help you access the calculator, converter & more at lightning speed.

◊ Quick Convert Widget - A medium and large widget that allows you to access your favorite conversions with one tap from your Home Screen (CalConvert Pro users only).

◊ CalConvert PRO: subscribe to unlock all 18 themes, access premium widgets, premium support, remove ads and more!

◊ App improvements and fixes include improving pull down to refresh currencies function, squashed a bug that was preventing users from unlocking Free Themes & improved iPad stability.

Feedback? Issues? Contact us at contact@maplemedia.io for fast and friendly support.
